name: HappyBall
description:
游戏故事背景是在一个矿石世界内。

This is a game with the background of the mineral world. 

玩家需要操作球球来探索这个未知的矿石世界并且需要以收集不同的矿石为目的来完成不同的关卡。

Players need to operate the ball in the game to explore in the mineral world and complete different levels with the purpose of collecting different minerals

下面是我们油管和B站账号链接，欢迎大家观看和订阅我们的频道！

The following is the video link of YouTube and Bilibili, welcome to watch and subscribe to our channel！
